global.name: Name
global.report_save: Choose a location where you would like to save your report
global.delete_error: An error occured while trying to delete

home.welcome_message_1: Risk Assessment Workflow for Recommendation Roadmaps
home.welcome_message_2:
Welcome to RAWRR! You can navigate to different sections on the top bar; or load test values/import from a previous export below.
	 You can come back to this screen at any time to export your work. For any comments or feedback, please visit the repository.
home.write_confirm: This action will write over your existing data
home.delete_confirm: This action will DELETE all your existing data
home.test_tooltip: Load a fixed set of values for testing purposes
home.delete_tooltip: Delete everything and start over from scratch
home.export_tooltip: Export the contents of the database to a file
home.import_tooltip: Import a previously exported database file
home.test_error: Test values could not be loaded
home.import_error_1: File could not be imported. Please try again with a valid database
home.import_error_26: File could not be imported. Please try again with a valid file
home.import_error_unkown: Something went wrong. The file could not be imported

forms.name: Name *
forms.name_restriction_2: Name must be equal or less than 150 characters

assets.title: Listing all assets
assets.subtitle: What you want to protect: people, devices, websites, servers

assets.delete_multiple_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the following assets?

activities.subtitle: Tasks you perform to understand the organization, like interviews or scans

reports.title: Report content selection
reports.subtitle: You can reorder and remove elements in the report content section
reports.to_add_info: Toggle between hidding or showing the 'Content not in report' column

reports.to_add_empty: If you remove an element from the report, it will appear here

reports.leave: If you leave this page you'll lose all progress on the report
